ALPINE1.reference: @misc{alpineFunction,title={Alpine #1 Function},howpublished={http://www.sfu.ca/~ssurjano/alpine.html},note={Surjanovic and Bingham, Virtual Library of Simulation Experiments}}
ALPINE1.summary: Alpine #1 is a multimodal benchmark function. The global minimum is 0 at x=0 (in any dimension).
